alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Borden; Dawson; Gaines; Howard; Martin; Scurry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 13 at 2:29AM CST until January 14 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR 20FT WINDS OF 20 TO 25 MPH, MINIMUM HUMIDITY NEAR 10 PERCENT, AND VERY HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO AND THE NORTHERN PARTS OF THE PERMIAN BASIN... The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa has issued a Fire Weather Watch for Southeast New Mexico and northern parts of the Permian Basin which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Gaines, Dawson, Borden, Scurry, Andrews, Martin, Howard, Chaves Plains, Eddy Plains and Lea. * TIMING...Friday afternoon and early evening. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. Wind shift to north early evening. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * RFTI...4 to 5 or near critical to critical.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Andrews; Borden; Dawson; Gaines; Howard; Martin; Scurry
